name: react-stripe-elements
description: React components for Stripe.js and Stripe Elements

scripts.build:umd: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=development webpack src/index.js dist/react-stripe-elements.js --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build:umd:min: cross-env BABEL_ENV=commonjs NODE_ENV=production webpack src/index.js dist/react-stripe-elements.min.js --config webpack.config.prod.js
scripts.build: yarn run lint && yarn run flow && yarn run build:commonjs && yarn run build:es && yarn run build:umd && yarn run build:umd:min
scripts.prepublish: yarn run clean && yarn run build
